sentences.en: Alice leapt from the car and ran full pelt towards the emergency room.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯跳下车，拼命奔向急诊室。

sentences.en: Crowds started to pelt police cars with stones.
sentences.cn: 人群开始向警车扔石块。

sentences.en: Dr. Pelt had had ample of experience playing presidential bartender.
sentences.cn: 佩尔特博士充任总统的酒吧侍者已是老手了.

sentences.en: Fur made from the pelt of a karakul lamb.
sentences.cn: 卡拉库耳大尾羊羊羔的毛皮.

sentences.en: He drove his car through the gates at full pelt.
He went full pelt at it, and had it finished under an hour.
sentences.cn: 他拼命地快做, 不到一小时就做好了.

sentences.en: I have given him a good pelt on the head.
sentences.cn: 我在他头上重重地打了一下.

sentences.en: I ran full pelt away from the harbour.
I saw him running at full pelt down the hill.
sentences.cn: 我看见他朝山下飞奔而去.

sentences.en: Mr. President, Dr. Pelt, truly I have no knowledge of this.
sentences.cn: 总统先生, 佩尔特博士, 我真的对此一无所知.

sentences.en: Pelt hustled in to be there when Arbatov arrived.
sentences.cn: 阿尔巴托夫来到,佩尔特也匆匆赶到了.

sentences.en: Pelt walked over to a rosewood cabinet against the wall.
sentences.cn: 佩尔特向墙边的红木酒柜走去.

sentences.en: Some of the younger men began to pelt one another with snowballs.
sentences.cn: 一些年轻人开始相互投掷雪球。

sentences.en: The boy gave the bully a pelt on the back with a pebble.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用石子掷击小流氓的背脊.

sentences.en: The boys were running at full pelt.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们急速地奔跑着.

sentences.en: The red fox was named for it's russet pelt.
sentences.cn: 赤狐因皮毛呈赤褐色而得名.

words.tran_cn: 盛怒的；微不足道的；没价值的
雨大降；投掷者或器具；大怒

trans.tran_en: the fur or hair of a living animal
If you pelt someone with things, you throw things at them

trans.tran_cn: （连续地）投掷，（雨等）急降，开火，<口>迅猛前进
